primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God intervenes in a 'rebellious house' (humanity/Israel/America) to perform a 'prodigious cleansing operation,' replacing hearts of stone with hearts of flesh and reckoning the unrighteous as righteous through His own performative word.

tekstueel_bewijs: I will speak the word and I will perform it
He never stops breathing life into my dry bones
God's purpose in election was already at work

object.identificatie: Righteousness (not human, but Christ's) and the 'New Heart'
tekstueel_bewijs: making the unrighteous to be righteous
give them a heart of flesh

zender.identificatie: The Sovereign Lord (The God of the Covenant)
tekstueel_bewijs: This is the Lord’s doing; it is marvelous in our eyes
Once you were no people but now you are God’s people
He loves us all and loves us each
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is explicitly moved from 'Subject' (trying to be righteous) to 'Receiver' (being reckoned righteous).

tekstueel_bewijs: breathing life into my dry bones
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject; Christ is the Mediator/Helper through whom the Subject acts.
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling power ('I will put a new spirit within them').

tegenstander.identificatie: Human Self-Righteousness / The 'Heart of Stone' / Sin / Death
tekstueel_bewijs: what we are continually doing in ourselves to spoil his work
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but an 'intractable and indeed unredeemable' nature that requires a total 'wholesale assault' by God.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The ethical response: the transformed people follow God's decrees.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Saved Human
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The preacher explicitly states that the primary program (God giving the heart) must happen first so that 'Then they will follow my decrees'.

subject_check.mens_als_subject_count: Low (mostly in the context of failure)
voorbeelden_god_subject: The Lord answered me and set me free.
God's purpose in election was already at work.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We want to identify ourselves among the righteous.

voorbeelden: The Commandments will cease to be tablets of stone that judge us.
We want to identify ourselves among the righteous.
We think we know what it means.
While we were still helpless, Christ died.
His word will perform what it requires.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on human 'non-pouvoir' (helplessness) and God's 'pouvoir' (performative word). Grace is the endowment of competence.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from ~S1 (Human righteousness/Nationalism) to S2 (Judgment/Exile) to S1 (Christ's Righteousness).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in S1 (Imputed Righteousness) which satisfies S2.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Very high; uses Ezekiel's imagery of desolation and 'kicking in blood'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon systematically deconstructs human agency ('prevenient agency') and makes God the sole active Subject of salvation.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: We are sure that God is on the side of America.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: I will speak the word and I will perform it.
utterly helpless and desolate in a condition that we can only call pre-moral.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The preacher explicitly rejects using the 'righteous' as models, instead defining them as those who receive a gift.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: None (Abraham Lincoln is used as a theological interlocutor, not a moral model)
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God is the one who acts upon the 'rebellious house'.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of self-justification; humility.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic sanctification (God performs what He requires).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Perfectly integrated; the secondary program (ethics) is strictly subordinated to the primary (soteriology).
spanning_punten: The tension between 'get yourselves a new heart' and 'I will give you a new heart' is resolved in favor of the latter.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Endowment: The Spirit provides the 'pouvoir-faire' that the law cannot.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Critical: 'heart of stone', 'rebellious house', 'kicking in blood'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in theocentric narrative structure. It identifies the human as an incompetent Subject and God as the intervening Subject.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a corrective sermon.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (sin/self-righteousness) is already depicted as a cosmic/ontological barrier.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a profound example of 'The Grammar of Grace.' It avoids the trap of instrumentalizing God and keeps the focus on His performative word.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis might focus on the use of Lincoln or the war context, semiotic analysis reveals that the underlying 'engine' is the transfer of righteousness from God to a passive recipient.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis might struggle with the contradictions in Ezekiel 18 vs 11; Greimassian analysis sees these as modal shifts (Devoir vs Pouvoir) and identifies which one the preacher privileges.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that 'righteousness' is the Object of Value that the Subject (God) must provide because the Receiver (Man) cannot attain it.

volledige_subject_lijst: God (answers, sets free, helps, speaks, performs, gives, removes, breathes life)
We (measure, divide, love violence, despise covenant)
appendices.notities: The sermon explicitly uses the term 'active agent' and 'prevenient agency,' showing a high level of structural awareness by the preacher (Fleming Rutledge).
